channel.title: Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens LOGO! Soft Comfort
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Note: LOGO! Soft Comfort products were previously listed as affected. They were removed after closer investigation showed that they are not affected. CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityNotVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Mendix Applications
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Although the Mendix runtime itself is not vulnerable to this exploit, we nevertheless recommend to upgrade log4j-core to the latest available version if log4j-core is part of your project. This advice is regardless of the JRE/JDK version the app runs on.

item.title: Siemens MindSphere App Management Cockpits (Developer & Operator)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Vulnerabilities fixed with update on 2021-12-16; no user actions necessary. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens MindSphere Cloud Foundry
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Although the Cloud Foundry environment itself is not vulnerable to this exploit, we nevertheless recommend to upgrade log4j-core to the latest available version if log4j-core is part of your project. See more update information here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens MindSphere Cloud Platform

See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens MindSphere Visual Explorer
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Although MindSphere Visual Explorer does not use the affected component directly it is included within the included third-party component Tableau. While the regarding interaction with Tableau is deactivated, a remediating patch for Tableau is still awaited.

item.title: Siemens NX

Find detailed mitigation steps here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Operation Scheduler
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Block both incoming and outgoing connections between the system and the Internet. item.title: Siemens Simcenter 3D
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the classpath. Find detailed remediation and mitigation information here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
